item.title: Mariana add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "Once upon a time there was a boy who loved a girl, and her laughter was a question he wanted to spend his whole life answering." -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Mariana add a quote by Nicole Krauss
item.description: "Even now, all possible feelings do not yet exist, there are still those that lie beyond our capacity and our imagination. From time to time, when a piece of music no one has ever written or a painting no one has ever painted, or something else impossible to predict, fathom or yet describe takes place, a new feeling enters the world. And then, for the millionth time in the history of feeling, the heart surges and absorbs the impact." -- Nicole Krauss

item.title: Mariana add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "Stories only happen to those who are able to tell them." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Mariana add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "When a person is lucky enough to live inside a story, to live inside an imaginary world, the pains of this world disappear. For as long as the story goes on, reality no longer exists." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Mariana add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "We all want to believe in impossible things, I suppose, to persuade ourselves that miracles can happen." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Mariana add a quote by Paul Auster
item.description: "Memory is the space in which a thing happens for a second time." -- Paul Auster

item.title: Mariana add a quote by Philip Roth
item.description: "The only obsession everyone wants: 'love.' People think that in falling in love they make themselves whole? The Platonic union of souls? I think otherwise. I think you're whole before you begin. And the love fractures you. You're whole, and then you're cracked open. " -- Philip Roth
